title: timing_tool.py
description: Tool for manipulating and evaluating stimulus timing files

timing_file.title: Timing File
timing_file.description: Specify a stimulus timing file to load

run_length.title: Run Duration
run_length.description: Specify the run duration(s), in seconds

tr.title: Time Resolution
tr.description: Specify the time resolution in 1D output (in seconds)

offset.title: Add Offset
offset.description: Add OFFSET to every time in the main element

extend_file.title: Extend File
extend_file.description: Extend timing rows with those in NEW_FILE

scale_data.title: Scale Data
scale_data.description: Multiply every stim time by SCALAR

shift_to_run_offset.title: Shift to Run Offset
shift_to_run_offset.description: Shift times so first event is at start of run

stim_duration.title: Stimulus Duration
stim_duration.description: Specify the stimulus duration, in seconds

multi_timing_files.title: Multiple Timing Files
multi_timing_files.description: Specify multiple timing files to load

multi_show_isi_stats.title: Show ISI Statistics
multi_show_isi_stats.description: Display timing and ISI statistics for the multiple timing files

multi_show_timing.title: Show Timing for Multiple Elements
multi_show_timing.description: Display info on multiple timing elements

show_timing.title: Show Timing for Single Element
show_timing.description: Display info on the main timing element

multi_stim_duration.title: Multiple Stimulus Durations
multi_stim_duration.description: Specify stimulus duration(s), in seconds, for multiple timing elements

round_times_frac.title: Round Times Fraction
round_times_frac.description: Round times to multiples of the TR (0.0 <= FRAC <= 1.0)

truncate_times.title: Truncate Times
truncate_times.description: Truncate times to multiples of the TR

multi_timing_event_list.title: Multiple Timing Event List
multi_timing_event_list.description: Create an event list file from multiple timing files
